title: Trump national security scrutinized for Signal leak at House Intel hearing
shortDescription: DNI director Tulsi Gabbard and CIA director John Ratcliffe faced questions at a House hearing about the recent Signal messages leak of classified military plans.

title: Democrats grill Trump officials over Signal leak | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Russia and Ukraine agree to sea and energy truce. | Trump signs executive order requiring proof of citizenship to vote in federal elections.

title: For Trump and his team, the messy lessons of #SignalGate
shortDescription: Amid the furor over inadvertently sharing war plans in a group chat, Trump circles the wagons and attacks the messenger.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to let it cut teacher training grants
shortDescription: A federal judge in Boston said the Trump administration killed the grants without a "reasoned explanation." The administration says the grants promote DEI.

title: Noem to visit Salvadoran mega-prison where Trump sent Venezuelans
shortDescription: Homeland Security Sec. Kristi Noem will visit a notorious prison in El Salvador that has received US deportees

title: Trump's federal elections executive order
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's latest executive order is remaking federal elections. Here's five things to know.

title: Trump, Musk turn eyes on - and pour dollars into - WI state race
shortDescription: The president and his billionaire ally are keeping close watch on a statewide race that could serve as a referendum on their popularity.

title: Trump admin on defense as Signal leak fallout spreads: live updates
shortDescription: The Atlantic magazine published Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth's Signal messages with classified war plans as the fallout over the leak continued.

title: Supreme Court sides with Biden on ghost gun regulations
shortDescription: The 7-2 decision, which overturned an opinion by a conservative appeals court, was a victory for Biden. But Trump could repeal the regulation.

title: In special elections, Dems claim Pa. House majority, lead Senate race
shortDescription: Democrats claimed a majority in the Pa. House and held a narrow lead in a Lancaster County state Senate district where the GOP has a strong advantage.

title: Atlantic reveals US attack plans Trump officials discussed in chat
shortDescription: The journalist at the center of the Trump administration's Signal chat fiasco publicly released attack plans discussed by senior US officials.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump overhauls voter registration
shortDescription: Americans must prove U.S. citizenship to vote. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: Trump signs executive order requiring proof of citizenship for voters
shortDescription: The order is expected to face challenges in court by civil rights groups, which argue it will disenfranchise millions of voters.

title: Trump pardons Devon Archer, who testified to GOP against Hunter Biden
shortDescription: Devon Archer, who had been convicted of fraud, was a former business associate of Hunter Biden and later testified against him in a Republican probe.

title: House GOP tries to squeeze judges over Trump frustration
shortDescription: The statement comes as Congress seeks to rein in federal judges who disagree with President Donald Trump.
